publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Ecclesiastes 7
ab.l: Jaḥšyraḥtyr jaḥšy šem olivadan da öĺǵań ḱuńu tuvɣ an ḱuńuńd́ań.
Jaḥšyraḥtyr barma jasly üv́ǵa barmaḥtan ič́ki üv́uńa anyn üč́uń ki oldur sofu bar ol adamnyn da har biri tiri qojsun ėsińa.
Jaḥšyraḥtyr čydama ačuvun uslunun ḱuĺt́- ḱuśuńd́ań t́eliniń ki jamanlyɣy byla öźĺariniń jaḥšy bolur üŕakḱa.
Ėsi da saɣyšy uslularnyn ja sly üv́d́a vale üŕagi t́eliĺarniń bijańč́ üv́uńd́a.
Jaḥšyraḥtyr ėšit́ḿa üŕak- ĺańḿagiń uslunun kišid́ań tynlavču jeriń t́eliĺarniń.
Ki avazy kibik ol t́eǵańakĺarniń ol qazan t́ub́uńa alejdyr ḱuĺt́ḱuśu ol t́eliniń daɣyn bu da heč́liktir.
Ki ol zulum- luḥ t́elirt́adir uslunu da taśet́adir aqylny b́erńaĺaḿak.
Jaḥšyraḥtyr sonɣusu ńerśaniń bašlyɣyndan jaḥšyraḥtyr uzaḥ acuvlu ökt́aḿ üŕaklid́ań.
Ǯaḥtlamaɣyn üŕagij byla ačyrɣanma ki ačyrḥanmaḥ qojnunda t́eliĺarniń toḥtajdyr.
Ajtmaɣyn ńe boldu ki ol ḱuńĺar ol burunɣular ėdiĺar jaḥšyraḥ bu- lardan ki t́uv́uĺ ustan sorduj bunun üč́uń.
Jaḥšyraḥtyr us üĺuš́ byla da artyḥsy us ḱoŕuv́č́uĺarǵa kečińḿagiń dunjanyn.
Ki ḱoĺaǵasińd́a usnun bolsa daɣy koĺaǵasi ol ḱuḿuš́ńuń da syjy biĺḿaginiń usnun tiri tutadyr jesisiń.
Ḱorǵuń jaratmaɣyn ol T́eńriniń ki kim bolalyr t́uźaḿa ńeki qynɣyrajtty any.

Jaḥšy vaḥtta bolɣun jaḥšylyḥta da jaman vaḥtta ḱorǵuń aqyl byla bunu qaršysyna bunun jaratty
T́eńri anyn üč́uń ki tapmaɣaj ol adam andan sortun ńeḿed́a.
Ol barysyn ḱord́um bu dunjalyḥ ḱuńĺarimd́a bardyr rast taspoladyr rastlyḥ byla da bardyr rašʿa uzartadyr ḱuńĺar jaman- lyɣy byla.
Bolmaɣyn rast artyɣač da uslu ḱorǵuźḿagiń öźujniu artyɣač ńeǵa adaɣan bolursun aqylyjdan.
Qynɣyr bolmaɣyn ḱop da bolmaɣyn t́eli ńeǵa öĺarsiń vaḥtyndan burun.
Jaḥšyraḥtyr ki tutsej bunu da daɣy bunuda jeb́erḿaśej qolujnu ki qorḥuvču T́eńrid́ań čyɣar rast baryndan.
Ol us ḱuč́ajt́adir uslunu ar- tyḥ on ėrkĺańuv́č́uĺard́ań ki bolsalar šaharda.
Ki joḥtur rast adam jerd́a ki qylɣej jaḥšyny da ki jazyḥly bolmaɣej.
Daɣy bar ol śoźĺarǵa ki śoźĺaśaĺar qojmaɣyn ėsijni ėšit́- ḿamuš ėtkiń qulujnu ki qarɣasa da śeni.
Ki daɣy ḱop forlar biĺadir üŕagij ki daɣy śeńd́a qarɣadyj ėkińčiĺarni.
Bar bunu synadyr us byla ajttym usajyrmyn da ol jiraḥtyr ḿeńd́ań.
Jiraḥtyr ńeki boldu t́eŕańdir kim tabalyr any.
Qajyrdym ḿeń üŕagimni biĺḿa da tińt́ḿa da iźĺaḿa usnu da ḥešbonnu da biĺḿa qynɣyrlyḥny t́elilikni da ol t́elilikt́a malahajlyḥ.
Da tabamyn ḿeń ačyraḥ öĺuḿd́ań ol qatynny ki ol qysyḥlyḥlar da avlar üŕagi anyn tutḥunlar kibik qollary anyn jaḥšy alnyn- da T́eńriniń qutulur andan da ol jazyḥly tutulur tuzaḥlaryna anyn.
Ḱorǵuń bunu taptym ajtty Qohelet ištyruvču usnu birni birǵa ištyryp bolalyrsyn tapma hešbon.

Ńeki artyḥ
iźĺadi ǯanym da tapmadym bir adam mińd́ań taptym da qatyn bar bu- larda tapmadym.
Ančaḥ ḱorǵuń bunu taptym ki jaratty ol T́eńri ol adamny t́uźńu vale alar izĺadiĺar ḱop hešbonlar.

app.note: Contrary to his previous practice the copyist put only the letter zayin which has numerical value 7 instead of writing ‘chapter 7’.
Partially illegible due to an unsuccessful correction of an erroneously written letter. Cf. ADub.III.84: jasly ivdedi.
